Posts.Content: hi sheena I am new to this site and have no idea where everything is or what to do! however i just found your comment and you have given me some hope.......i was diagnosed with secondary breast, (march this year) now in spine, legs, arms and liver, i am so worried about the liver right now and am having sweats and sick all the time. going to see the consultant tomorow and dreading what he will say.............. anna
Posts.Title: Secondary liver
